events.name: onClose
events.description: Handler that is called when the close button is pressed. If you pass this prop, the chip will display a close button (endContent).
events.description_zh: 按下关闭按钮时调用的处理程序。如果传递此道具，芯片将显示一个关闭按钮 （endContent）。

variant.type: solid / bordered / light / flat / faded / shadow / dot

color.type: default / primary / secondary / success / warning / danger

:avatar.description: Avatar to be rendered in the left side of the chip.
:avatar.description_zh: 头像要渲染在芯片的左侧。

:startContent.description: Element to be rendered in the left side of the chip. This prop overrides the `avatar` prop.
:startContent.description_zh: 要在芯片左侧渲染的元素。此道具覆盖了“头像”道具。

:endContent.description: Element to be rendered in the right side of the chip. This prop overrides the default close button when `onClose` is passed.
:endContent.description_zh: 要在芯片右侧渲染的元素。当传递 'onClose' 时，此道具会覆盖默认的关闭按钮。

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the chip slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为芯片插槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: base
slots.description: The base slot of the chip, it is the container of the chip.
slots.description_zh: 芯片的基槽，它是芯片的容器。

slots.name: content
slots.description: The content slot of the chip, it is the container of the chip children.
slots.description_zh: 芯片的内容槽，它是芯片子项的容器。

slots.name: dot
slots.description: Small dot on the left side of the chip. It is visible when the variant=dot prop is passed.
slots.description_zh: 芯片左侧的小点。当传递 variant=dot prop 时，它是可见的。

slots.name: avatar
slots.description: Avatar classes of the chip. It is visible when the avatar prop is passed.
slots.description_zh: 芯片的头像类。当头像道具被传递时，它是可见的。

slots.name: closeButton
slots.description: Close button classes of the chip. It is visible when the onClose prop is passed.
slots.description_zh: 关闭芯片的按钮类。当传递 onClose 属性时，它是可见的。
